name: Kaenic Rookern
passive: Magebane: After not taking magic damage for 4 seconds, gain a magic shield equal to 100% bonus Magic Resist. When the shield is broken, nearby enemies take magic damage.
description: Item that provides Health, Magic Resist. Passive effect: After not taking magic damage for 4 seconds, gain a magic shield equal to 100% bonus Magic Resist. When the shield is broken, nearby enemies take magic damage.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
